response.overview: George Elliot, an amazing Fortnite player, accidently kills the top Australian Fortnite player, Ahron the Bully, in a casual match. Enraged, Ahron and his gang destroy Georges house and break his computer. On his last dollar, George receives a call, stating that a Fortnite world cup will be held soon, with a 3 million dollar prize pool. George, ecstatic at a chance to trump Ahron at his own game, joins the competition. Then, out of the blue, the underdog, George Elliot somehow beats Ahron with a 360 no-scope, sealing his win and cementing him as the worlds best player.
response.tagline: Just because you’re in the storm doesn’t mean the game is over…
response.title: Fortnite World Cup - The Movie
